categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Bella was a Human female who held the rank of private in the Imperial Military during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY, she was stationed on the Vaiken Spacedock in the Imperial Fleet, where she made her living as a vendor.
Bella first appeared in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic for Imperial classes. She can be found at the Imperial Fleet, and serves as a vendor.
